name: chris whitworth
detailedDescription: Great developer, exceptional musician. Part of our customer delight development team.

missions.name: destroymaracas
missions.description: Chris gave James something really annoying.

dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'I think I made a terrible mistake.'
'After the last Red Gate day out I offered a prize to whoever could guess the full list of samples used in one of my tracks.'
'Unfortunately for all of us, James Dening won.'
'Now in addition to his boundless positivity he's liable to shake his maracas at people.'
'Can you get hold of them and quietly destroy them whilst nobody's looking?'

dialogue.response:
'Great! He's often hanging around the Customer Delight management area.'
'He's pretty friendly so as long as you've not upset him in any way (or taken anything else of his) you might be able to simply ask him for them.'

reward.message: OK, so it wasn't the nicest thing to do to James but at least you've preserved Chris' sanity for a while.

fail.message: You know, refusing to help people out on your first day in the office is going to put you on thr fast track to nowhere.
